content: Oooh look at all the mansplaining in the comments… I found it particularly interesting to consider, as one of your other (non-mansplaining) commenters did, how the emotional labor aspect of AI (or machine learning, or whatever you want to call it) is being developed in general by people who do very little of it themselves. The bulk of the tech industry is young white men. This is not a demographic well known for its emotional labor.
